name: Jamming Racing
description:
This is a Kenney Jam 2019 entry!

The theme was Unlikely Combination and the goal was to create a blend between Asteroids and a Racing game but it didn't turn out that way. I only had time to actually add the racing part and not the asteroids part. But a pretty good race game was complete and I'm happy with the result!

Leaderboard
There is a built in global leaderboard but I only had time to do the UI for the rank. But at least you can see how good your time was compared with others.

Controls
Joypad is recommended.
WASD or arrow keys.
